title: Oce chat restriction?
body: One of my friends recently got banned, and it reminds me of the time I was banned for toxicity, and yes I probably deserved it but it was both of our first offences so why didn't we just get chat restricted??

replies.body: i was playing a game with a sona who was trolling and i got mad cause he kept talking smack and yet even though he inted and was toxic i told him off and i got the ban and chat restriction + lost my lvl 3 honour like what the meme is this. does this mean if i dont int but i annoy some1 and they go toxic they get the ban?

There are some auto triggers that skip chat restrictions iirc such as "kys".

Could he haslve said something along those lines?
You're telling me I can threaten to gas a race and get a 10 gamer and "kys" is auto 2 weeks?

umm as a 'reformed' player so to speak I will try to put it simply but basically, so if you swear at someone or something for any reason at all and get reported it will go straight to your accounts chat logs of being negative/abusive, if you choose to threaten someone or abuse someone about their gender or anything along the lines you can pay the price of an instant perma ban meaning you will skip the first and second step, if lucky you will hit a two week ban of a player reforming due to the severity of the situation. Basically if you repeat the offence of swearing at someone in a negative or abusive way it will lead to a chat restriction depending on how badly negative/toxic you are being, but at the same time you must remember that Riot/tribunal will only ever take action if these triggers of toxicity come up in chat logs of your games.

So here's a tip: take it from me minimise your swearing as much as you can because even some 'but hurt' 12 year old could report you and you could pay the price just for swearing once. The second tip would be to not be abusive to your team mates as that is 90% of the cases where people are having their accounts banned. If you are unsure of what to do in game and your put in a rubbish situation before going out and lashing out at your team mate just leave the game if you have to, I understand you pay the penalty of a low priority que but its better then your account being banned or unable to be used. Just make sure you think clearly about what your gonna do in the situation your in whether it be a good or bad one. Make wise decisions and try not to get caught in trashy situations.

Good luck summoner and my best endeavours to you and your mate on your road back to reforming.
